gameDetails.name: Spirits of the Forest: Moonlight
gameDetails.description:
Spirits of the Forest: Moonlight is an expansion for the base game that adds a scenario-based co-op mode that can also be played in solitaire, and an alternative multiplayer variant that can be played up to four players.

Nocturnal Creatures - These creatures will be a fundamental part of the game as their position in the Forest will decide which tiles you will get access to during your turn, and which moonlight bits you will be able to keep.

Moonlight bits - These little creatures will primarily allow you to score points at the end of each scenario. The more you get, the more Spirits you will be able to get points from.

Moonlight tiles - This is a new type of tile that will be included in selected scenarios and in the multiplayer variant of Moonlight. Its rules will change depending on the scenario you are playing.

Moonlight cards - Moonlight cards act as missions to accomplish. These cards show four spirits of which you need a majority in order to avoid losing 6 points for each unfulfilled spirit.
Ties won’t be considered as a majority.

-description from publisher
